entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
